panels.description: The capacity size of each TiKV instance

panels.description: The available capacity size of each TiKV instance
panels.title: Store available

panels.description: The used capacity size of each TiKV instance
panels.title: Store used

panels.description: It is equal to Store available capacity size over Store capacity size for each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="store_available"}) by (address, store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type="store_capacity"}) by (address, store)

panels.title: Store available ratio

panels.description: The size amplification, which is equal to Store Region size over Store used capacity size, of each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="region_size"}) by (address, store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type="store_used"}) by (address, store) * 2^20

panels.title: Size amplification

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_schedule_filter{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", action="filter-source", type!="store-state-tombstone-filter"}[1m])*60) by (source, type, scope)
sum(rate(pd_schedule_filter{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", action="filter-target", type!="store-state-tombstone-filter"}[1m])*60) by (target, type, scope)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(pd_scheduler_handle_region_heartbeat_duration_seconds_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store"}[1m])) by (address, store, le))

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats which each TiKV instance reports to PD

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="report", status="ok"}[1m])*60) by (address, store)

panels.title: Region heartbeat report

panels.description: The breakdown metric about heartbeat
panels.title: Heartbeat Performance Duration BreakDown (Accumulation)

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats which pending in the task queue.

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats which faileds in the task queue.
panels.title: Concurrent Runner Failed Task

panels.description: The count of the corresponding schedule commands which PD sends to each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="push"}[5m])*60) by (address, store, status)

panels.title: Region schedule push

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats with the error status

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="report", status="err"}[1m])*60) by (address, store)

panels.title: Region heartbeat report error

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats with the ok status

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="report", status="bind"}[1m])*60) by (address, store)

panels.title: Region heartbeat report active

panels.description: The store heartbeat handle duration in .99

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(pd_scheduler_handle_store_heartbeat_duration_seconds_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store"}[1m])) by (address, store, le))

panels.title: 99% store heartbeat handle duration

panels.description: The count of the message which PD send to each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_hbstream_region_message{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="push", status="ok"}[1m])*60) by (address, store)

panels.title: Heartbeat stream report

panels.description: The count of the message which PD send to each TiKV instance with error status

targets.expr: sum(rate(pd_hbstream_region_message{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", type="push", status="err"}[1m])*60) by (address, store)

panels.title: Heartbeat stream report error
